ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainModReasonRequiredToRelease
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Modification Reason Code is missing for all marked items in Item List. Document cannot be released.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainModReasonRequiredToSave
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Modification Reason Code is missing for all marked items in Item List. Document cannot be saved.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainProductItemMetaAndUnitNotUnique
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The product(s) #summary# has/have been assigned more than once using the same item template or quantity logistic unit.
ValidationMessage.comment: Product with same item template and quantity logistic unit can only exist once.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainBlindModeItemsNotYetEdited
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: There are scheduled items that have not yet been edited and document could not be released.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainQuantityExceedsUserInventorySummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for some products is overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for this product.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainQuantityExceedsUserInventoryWarningSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for some products is overdrawn: #summary#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainQuantityExceedsQuotaSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for some products are overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for this product.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainQuantityExceedsQuotaWarningSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for some products is overdrawn: #summary#.
